card.name: Perfect Fire
card.text: ■ Choose 2 of the following. ''(You may choose the same one twice.)'' :► Put a creature that costs 3 or less from your hand. :► One of your creatures gets "speed attacker" until the End Step

card.name: Zuttomo Moment
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Draw a card. ■ Return all your opponent's creatures that cost the same as or less than the number of cards in your hand to their owner's hand.

card.name: Assister Mogiringo
card.text: ■ Justdiver ■ Once per turn, your Magics may cost 1 less to use. They can't cost 0 or less.

card.name: Aqua Vibrato
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, draw a card.

card.name: Takasugi Wawonchopper
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger Plus ■ Icon ■ This creature can't be blocked.

card.name: Author-Unknown-Machine/"Magical", Water Summon Spell
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Powered Blocker ■ Double Breaker ========================= ■ Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. You may reveal a Magic or spell from among them and add it to your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of the deck in any order.

card.name: Pastel, Dancing Music Love/♪ Mysterious Magical Prison Kinkirarin
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Blocker ■ Mega Last Burst ========================= ■ Choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures. They can't attack or block until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Torinodomino, Geima Mountain Falcon
card.text: ■ Revolution Change: Magic ''(When one of your magics attacks, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand.)'' ■ When you put this creature, draw 3 cards, then discard 2 cards from your hand.

card.name: Chaturanga, Geima Earth Chariot
card.text: ■ Revolution Change: Magic that costs 5 or more ''(When one of your magics that cost 5 or more attacks, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand.)'' ■ Double Breaker ■ This creature can't be attacked or blocked.

card.name: Kerora, Pop Cola/♪ A Thin Frog, Don't Lose Kerora, Spiral
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Mega Last Burst ========================= ■ Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your hand and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.
